Name: Sex Adventures - Swingers Resort
About the game: About the game An explicit erotic visual novel following the story of two couples having sex wit each other at the pool of an Adult Only Resort. Visual Novel Description Bianca and Barrett have decided to spend their sixth vacation together at an Adult Only Resort on the coast of a beautiful island. Clear skies, breathtaking views…and a gorgeous private pool, set far away from the prying eyes of the staff. What could they possibly want more? The first days pass with them relaxing under the warm sun, chilling in the cool waters of the pool and simply enjoying their free time. But soon, the vacation takes an entire new turn when Barret comes with this interesting idea of wanting to watch Bianca fuck another guy. Interested and excited by his proposal, Bianca begins scanning their surroundings in search for a hot man to make out with. Imagine her surprise, when this hot blonde couple joins them in the pool and starts hitting on them both, opening the gates for a whole new idea: why fool around with one single guy, when they can both get some action? … Will they convince the new couple to indulge in their fantasy? Follow the story and find out… Features - 50+ HD renders - Animations
